newsitem.title: USA: Employee Solutions to buy McClary-Trapp.
newsitem.headline: Employee Solutions to buy McClary-Trapp.

text.p: Employee Solutions Inc said Monday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire the assets of the McClary-Trapp Companies for $10.7 million.
The company said it expected to close the deal before the end of the month.

With annualized revenues of about $55 million, McClary-Trapp leases about 2,000 employees to a client base consisting primarily of light industrial, transportation and service companies. It is based in Georgetown, South Carolina and Russellville, Alabama, servicing about 125 customers in about 15 states.
Employee Solutions is a professional employer organization, providing employers with employee payroll, human resources and benefits outsourcing services.
